explanation:
code_hardening: Added null checks for the incoming JFreeChart, its CategoryPlot, axes, and renderer, and guarded BarRenderer-specific configuration with an instanceof check.
resolve_compilation_errors: Removed all dataset and chart creation logic and avoided any dataset-related references; relied only on existing JFreeChart/CategoryPlot APIs with fully qualified names where appropriate.
exception_handling: none.
logic_customization: Updated the title font to Font.BOLD with size 14, removed the explicit setSeriesPaint call so default renderer colors are used, and preserved all other theme, plot, axis, anti-aliasing, bar painter, shadow, and maximum bar width settings.
refactoring: Implemented the styling as a reusable private static helper that accepts an existing JFreeChart parameter, keeping the existing method name used by callers while focusing it purely on styling.
misc: Minor reformatting and inline comments for readability; no functional changes beyond the specified adjustments.
